sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a standard deck of 52 playing cards?
message_2:
There is only one King of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 playing cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing a King of Hearts is 1 (the number of King of Hearts) divided by 52 (the total number of cards in the deck).

Probability = (Number of favorable outcomes) / (Total number of possible outcomes)

Probability = 1/52

The probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a standard deck of 52 playing cards is 1/52 or approximately 0.0192 or 1.92%.
